entry.value: SELECT Ingestion_State_Id, Ingestion_State_Code FROM Media.Ingestion_State WHERE Ingestion_State_Id = ?
SELECT Ingestion_State_Id, Ingestion_State_Code FROM Media.Ingestion_State WHERE Ingestion_State_Code = ?
SELECT Ingestion_State_Code FROM Media.Ingestion_State
SELECT * FROM Status WHERE id = ?
SELECT * FROM Status WHERE code = ?

INSERT INTO Media.Ingestion_Step (Workflow_State_Id, Rerun_Number, Description, Status_Code, Ingestion_State_Code, Created_By, Created_On_Date, Changed_On_Date, Changed_By, Workstation_Name, Application_Id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT * FROM IngestionStep WHERE id = ?

SELECT Ingestion_Step_Id, Workflow_State_Id, Rerun_Number, Description, Status_Code, Ingestion_State_Code, Changed_By, Created_On_Date, Changed_On_Date FROM Media.Ingestion_Step WHERE Workflow_State_Id = ? AND Ingestion_State_Code = ? ORDER BY Created_On_Date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT Ingestion_Step_Id, Workflow_State_Id, Rerun_Number, Description, Status_Code, Ingestion_State_Code, Changed_By, Created_On_Date, Changed_On_Date FROM Media.Ingestion_Step WHERE Workflow_State_Id = ?

SELECT Ingestion_Step_Id, Workflow_State_Id, Rerun_Number, Description, Status_Code, Ingestion_State_Code, Changed_By, Created_On_Date, Changed_On_Date FROM Media.Ingestion_Step WHERE Workflow_State_Id IN (SELECT Workflow_State_Id FROM Media.Workflow_State WHERE Document_Id = ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM (?) T1

SELECT Ingestion_Step.Created_On_Date AS date, Workflow_State.Document_Id AS documentId, Ingestion_Step.Ingestion_State_Code AS step, Ingestion_Step.Rerun_Number AS count, Ingestion_Step.Description AS description FROM Media.Ingestion_Step INNER JOIN Media.Workflow_State ON Workflow_State.Workflow_State_Id = Ingestion_Step.Workflow_State_Id INNER JOIN Media.Workflow_State state ON state.Rerun_Number = Ingestion_Step.Rerun_Number INNER JOIN Media.Document_Images ON Document_Images.Document_Id = Workflow_State.Document_Id WHERE Ingestion_Step.Status_Code = "Failed" AND (Document_Images.Ingestion_Status = "Failure" OR Document_Images.Ingestion_Status = "Skipped")
GROUP BY Workflow_State.Document_Id, Ingestion_Step.Ingestion_State_Code
INSERT INTO Media.Workflow_State (Document_Id, Force_Rerun, Rerun_Number, Ingestion_State_Code, Created_By, Changed_By, Workstation_Name, Application_Id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT Workflow_State_Id, Document_Id, Force_Rerun, Rerun_Number, Ingestion_State_Code FROM Media.Workflow_State WHERE Workflow_State_Id = ?
SELECT Workflow_State_Id, Document_Id, Force_Rerun, Rerun_Number, Ingestion_State_Code, Changed_By FROM Media.Workflow_State WHERE Document_Id = ?
UPDATE Media.Workflow_State SET Ingestion_State_Code = ?, Rerun_Number = ?, Force_Rerun = ?, Changed_By = ?, Changed_On_Date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE Workflow_State_Id = ?
UPDATE Media.Workflow_State SET Force_Rerun = ?, Changed_By = ?, Changed_On_Date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE Workflow_State_Id = ?
UPDATE Media.Workflow_State SET Ingestion_State_Code = ?, Changed_By = ?, Changed_On_Date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE Workflow_State_Id = ?
SELECT Workflow_Shutdown_StateId, Shutdown_State, Changed_By, Changed_On_Date FROM Media.Workflow_Shutdown_State ORDER BY Changed_On_Date DESC LIMIT 1
INSERT INTO Media.Workflow_Shutdown_State (Shutdown_State, Created_By, Changed_By, Workstation_Name, Application_Id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE Media.Workflow_Shutdown_State SET Shutdown_State = ?, Changed_By = ?, Changed_On_Date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE Workflow_Shutdown_StateId = ?

INSERT INTO Media.DocumentException ( BatchProfileJobId, DocumentId, DocumentStatusId, ErrorDescription,CreatedOnDate,CreatedBy,ChangedOnDate,ChangedBy,WorkstationName,ApplicationId) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

select BatchProfileId,Version, JobStatusId, ExecutionStartDateTime, ExecutionEndDateTime, TotalDocumentsToBeProcessed, DocumentsProcessed, DocumentsInException, DocumentsFailed,DeleteTempDataAfter, CreatedOnDate,CreatedBy,ChangedOnDate,ChangedBy,WorkstationName,ApplicationId from Media.BatchProfileJob;

INSERT INTO Media.BatchProfileJob ( BatchProfileId,Version, JobStatusId, ExecutionStartDateTime, ExecutionEndDateTime, TotalDocumentsToBeProcessed, DocumentsProcessed, DocumentsInException, DocumentsFailed,DeleteTempDataAfter, CreatedOnDate,CreatedBy,ChangedOnDate,ChangedBy,WorkstationName,ApplicationId) VALUES (?, ?,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?);

CREATE TABLE ? (TempTableId BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, DocumentId BIGINT, Created_By VARCHAR(128), Created_On_Date TIMESTAMP, Changed_By VARCHAR(128), Changed_On_Date TIMESTAMP, Workstation_Name VARCHAR(256), Application_Id INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (TempTableId))
